projects.title: Simulation of Micro channel flow with Mass transfer
projects.description: â€¢Analysed the flow of an electrically neutral solute dissolved with an electrolyte solution, in porous micro tube due to combined pressure and electroosmotically driven flow, Using Computational fluid dynamics formulation.â€¢Determined and plotted the velocity and concentration profile along the micro tube as a function of reduced length (y*) of the tube, using Matlab as a coding and modelling platform.

projects.title: Titanic Learning QI
projects.description: â€¢The data set Contained 4 Categorical and 4 numerical variables.â€¢Combined training and test data for certain operations like converting titles across data set to numerical values.â€¢Observed nearly 30% of the passengers had siblings and/or spouses aboard which was used to create a new feature which was family sizeâ€¢Used Logistic regression model to obtain a score of .8935.

projects.title: DATA ANALYTICS APPROACH TO REACTION KINETICS |
projects.description: â€¢ Performed RWGS reaction at multiple temperatures in order to generate an equilibrium property dataset across the range.â€¢ Increased efficiency of reaction by analyzing dependency of kinetic parameters on overall CO2 conversion using Matplotlibâ€¢ Predicted the Temperature for maximum conversion by implementing Linear Regression Model on the data set in MATLAB
